edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.damgardJurikEncryptedZero

Class SigmaDJEncryptedZeroCommonInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.damgardJurikEncryptedZero.SigmaDJEncryptedZeroCommonInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaCommonInput, ZKCommonInput, java.io.Serializable

    public class SigmaDJEncryptedZeroCommonInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaCommonInput
    Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaDamgardJurikEncryptedZero verifier and simulator. In SigmaProtocolDamgardJurikEncryptedZero, the common input contains DamgardJurikPublicKey and a BigIntegerCiphertext.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
